physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 55 cm (3rd percentile), Weight: 4100 g (below the 3rd percentile), Head circumference: 47 cm (Normal)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Craniofacial anomalies: microretrognathia, downslanting palpebral fissures, high forehead, low-set and posteriorly rotated dysplastic cup-shaped ears, absence of medial lower lid eyelashes, smooth philtrum, high arched palate. Limb anomalies: absence of right thumb, duplication of right second finger. Inward rotation of halluces.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 5 years old: hypernasal speech, nasal emission, compensatory substitutions, consonant and vowel distortions, microdontia of the primary dentition.
